__e: Does anyone here recognize this gentleman?
I was wondering if you recognised this phone number 929-2279.
But no one recognizes these powers as their own.
I guess I can wear this now that he won't recognize it when he sees it.
But the people doesn't care for that.
I'm glad somebody around here knows that.
I know you recognize the importance of that.
- Of course, you recognize the importance of time.
You're the only one who doesn't know the importance of money!
But luck is something you also fail to recognise, Mr. Spock.
Now, my darling, you know class when you see it, don't you?
You're the only one who doesn't know the importance of money!
I feel wonderful. All we need worry about now is Eddie taking my bar.
Now, do any of you recognise either the name or the photograph?
But does anyone even acknowledge what I've done?
- Avigdor, what do you think? The Talmud recognizes life is filled with contradiction.
You admit a dictatorship is needed.
You acknowledge that the transmission of information over the internet is potentially insecure and we cannot guarantee the security of data sent over the internet.
Dr. Emerson does not feel that you are in a healthy enough mental state to make a rational decision, especially one of this seriousness and finality.
I am one of those officers who recognizes that the army could not function without a sergeant like you.
Because they recognize that the movement is an instrument of fight,
You admit no machine can do our work?
Now he does not admit that he is sticking out, but everything is clear.
Why don't you admit there was no woman with you last night?
